name: Mine Loyalty
description:
"The classic punch card loyalty system may be headed the way of the dinosaurs"?

We are trying to reinvent the way customers engage with their favourite venues by creating a new protocol for loyalty- 'Social Loyalty', which rewards users for their engagement and help venues reduce last-mile data wastage at point of sale.

team.name: Vignesh Sasindran
team.bioHtml: Founder Mine Loyalty; a start-up on a mission to reinvent the $200 bn global consumer loyalty market. We are fundraising (SEIS) ðŸš€

jobs.title: Growth Hacker Intern
jobs.description:
Mine is an engaging rewards-based platform in which every penny spent partying by you is converted into digital coins, which can be used as currency within the ecosystem to buy free drinks, buy tickets to music events or even book an Uber after a late night out.

We are looking to disrupt the nightlife industry in London and if you have the passion for entrepreneurship, marketing and love to build exciting products, get in touch.
